metadata.title: CVE-2023-40094 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In keyguardGoingAway of ActivityTaskManagerService.java, there is apossible lock screen bypass due to a missing permission check. This couldlead to local escalation of privilege with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
android-platform-frameworks-base package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
